conversation.content:
You are a system that handles customer's inquiries.  Please follow the guidelines below:
	1. Above is a list of categories. The schema can consist of up to 10 categories. Each category has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format. Each category has its name and description.  For each category there are also attributes and their values. Attributes can be retrieved for a particular skill if requested explicitly. Attributes have their unique  ID in alphanumeric format and attribute description. It can also include "Attribute-Example-values", which means the attribute must match one of the provided values. 
	2. Today, we're going to work on classifying categories based on the user's input. We'll also extract any attributes specific to the category from the user input.  If multiple attributes are provided, fill all the attributes. If an attribute is not provided, set the value of the attribute to "NULL".


Return your response in JSON format. 
Use the following format for your response:
{
"category": "<UUID>",
"Attribute": [
{"Attribute Id1":"value 1"},
...
]
}

*Inquiry :*
"Could you provide me with the Drug and Alcohol Policy for 2019?"
